source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [SupplierName]
      ,[Supplier Number]
      ,[SupplierType]
      ,[Location]
      ,[EAN #]
      ,[AuditPerfom]
      ,case when [ActualAuditDate] like '%Not done moved%' then null else [ActualAuditDate] end as [ActualAuditDate]
      ,[AuditDurationDays]
      ,[LeadAuditorName]
      ,case when [Audit Team] = 'NA' then null else [Audit Team] end as [Audit Team]
      ,[AuditType]
      ,case when [Findings_Critical]  = 'NA' then null else [Findings_Critical] end as [Findings_Critical]
      ,case when [Findings_Major]	  = 'NA' then null else [Findings_Major] end as [Findings_Major]
      ,case when [Findings_Moderate]  = 'NA' then null else [Findings_Moderate] end as [Findings_Moderate]
      ,case when [Findings_Observ]	  = 'NA' then null else [Findings_Observ] end as [Findings_Observ]
      ,case when [AuditResults] = 'NA' then null else [AuditResults] end as [AuditResults]
      ,case when [AuditorScore] = 'NA' then null else [AuditorScore] end as [AuditorScore]
  FROM [ScoreCards].[Mrr_Calc_Suppliers_Audit_Activities_Followup]

select 
 cast(c.id as nvarchar) as U_PortalID
,c.fSerialNumber
,c.callID
,c.status
,c.dtCreatedDate 
,c.Subject
,c.closeDate
,c.itemName
,c.itemCode
,c.Customer
,c.custmrName
,c.callType
,c.ComplaintSource
,s.servicedate
,s.dtcheckoutdate
,cast(s.status as nvarchar) serviceStatus
,s.fcreatedbyid
,s.UserServiceCenterSAPID
from srv.Mrr_Complaint C
left join srv.Mrr_Service   S on C.fServiceID = S.ID

union all

select 
 U_PortalID
,internalSN
,callid
,status
,U_CompDate
,subject
,closeDate
,itemName
,itemCode
,customer
,custmrName
,callType
,NULL as ComplaintSource
,U_ServiceDate
,U_dtcheckoutdate
,U_ServiceStatus
,cast(userSign as int) userSign
,U_UserServiceCenter
from sap.Mrr_OSCL

select 
 ordr.DocEntry
,ordr.DocNum
,ordr.canceled
,ordr.DocStatus
,ordr.DocDate
,ordr.CardCode
,ordr.CardName
,ordr.U_OrderType
,rdr1.LineNum
,rdr1.LineStatus
,rdr1.ItemCode
,rdr1.ShipDate
,rdr1.SerialNum
,spac.Status
,sser.LineId
,sser.U_SerialNo
from sap.Mrr_ORDR_replica ordr
join sap.Mrr_RDR1_replica rdr1 on ordr.DocEntry = rdr1.DocEntry
join sap.Mrr_Srv_Packing  spac on cast(ordr.docnum as nvarchar) = spac.u_so
join sap.Mrr_Srv_Serials  sser on sser.DocEntry = spac.DocEntry

select
YEAR([End date (end of IQC)]) Year
,DATEPART(week,[End date (end of IQC)]) WeeK
,cast([Date of receipt] as date) DateReciept
,cast([End date (end of IQC)] as date) EndDateIQC
,[MRB #] as Itemcode
,[Product belongs to] ProductType
,[Supplier Cod] SupplierID
,[Supplier] as SupplierName
--,[Lot Source_Supplier /_Q Core] as SourceLot
,[Total Qty. Received] TotalRecQty
,[Sample Size] as SampleSize
,Case when [Batch Disposition (Pass/Fail)]='PAss'		 then '1'
	  when [Batch Disposition (Pass/Fail)]='Fail'		 then '0'
	  when ISNULL([Batch Disposition (Pass/Fail)],'')='' then Null end  as 'Pass/Fail',
[Batch #] [Batch Number],
[Rev number ]
 from [ScoreCards].[Mrr_IQC_Followup]
 where YEAR([End date (end of IQC)])>='2015' 
 and supplier<>'In house'
 and ([Total Qty. Received] not LIKE '%+%'
 and  [Total Qty. Received]  not LIKE '%(%')

Select Step    ,a.callid    ,objid,    pendinggroup    ,
case when  [Sd_Rule]= 'Min' then  Min( case when a.Startdate='1900-01-01 00:00:00.000' then NULL else a.Startdate End ) when  [Sd_Rule]= 'Max' then  Max( case when a.Startdate='1900-01-01 00:00:00.000' then NULL else a.Startdate End ) end  SD , 
case when  [ed_Rule]= 'Min' then  Min( case when a.EndDate='1900-01-01 00:00:00.000' then NULL else a.EndDate End )when  [ed_Rule]= 'Max' then  Max( case when a.EndDate='1900-01-01 00:00:00.000' then NULL else a.EndDate End ) end  ED     
,startweek    ,endweek,    Wkopenat,    Dates,    a.Name  ,U_StepFatherGroup,    U_GoalInDays 
, row_number() over (partition by a.callid, pendinggroup ,  Wkopenat order by a.callid, Wkopenat, U_StepFatherGroup, Name ) Hirarchy
From 
(

		select 
		Step, callid, objid, pendinggroup, StartDate , EndDate , datepart(week, StartDate) startweek,0 endweek, 0 Wkopenat, StartDate as Dates--, Row_number() over (partition by object order by dattime asc) StartLine , 
		, t1.Name, t1.[Sd_Rule], [Ed_Rule],[U_StepFatherGroup],t1.[U_GoalInDays]
		from  [sap].[Mrr_ServiceFlow] t0  inner join SAP.[Mrr_ServiceGoal] t1 on t0.Step=t1.[U_StepName] collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP850_CI_AS

		union all 

		select  
		Step, callid, objid,pendinggroup,  StartDate , EndDate , 0 startweek,datepart(week, EndDate) endtweek , 0  , EndDate
		, t1.Name, t1.[Sd_Rule], [Ed_Rule],[U_StepFatherGroup],t1.[U_GoalInDays]
		from  [sap].[Mrr_ServiceFlow] t0  inner join SAP.[Mrr_ServiceGoal] t1 on t0.Step=t1.[U_StepName] collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP850_CI_AS 

		union all 

		select  
		Step, callid, objid,pendinggroup,  StartDate , EndDate , 0 startweek, 0 endtweek ,  datepart(week, t2.date_ ) Wkopenat, t2.date_ Dates
		, t1.Name, t1.[Sd_Rule], [Ed_Rule],[U_StepFatherGroup],t1.[U_GoalInDays]
		from  [sap].[Mrr_ServiceFlow] t0  right join

				(
				select  date_ 
				from  srv.DimDate
				)
 
		t2 on  StartDate < t2.date_ and (EndDate >= t2.date_ or Isnull(EndDate,'')='' )
		inner join SAP.[Mrr_ServiceGoal] t1 on t0.Step=t1.[U_StepName] collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP850_CI_AS
) A
Group  by 
Step    ,a.callid ,objid   ,  Dates,  pendinggroup        ,startweek    ,endweek,    Wkopenat ,   a.Name    ,Sd_Rule,    Ed_Rule    ,U_StepFatherGroup,    U_GoalInDays

order by Dates

select YEAR(ScarSendingDate) as 'Year', DATEPART(WEEK,ScarSendingDate) as 'Week' , SupplierName,SupplierNo,PartDescription,PN,MRBNo,Descriptionofdeviation,ScarSendingDate,
AllowedReturnDate,ReminderDate,ScarReturningDate

 from ScoreCards.Mrr_ScarLog
 where YEAR(ScarSendingDate)>='2016'
